leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 数字健康-临床文本与多模态生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 抽取→标准化→检索→问答→评测

unit.unit_name: 医疗NLP 抽取/标准化（ICD/SNOMED等）

queries: [WEB] icd-10 automatic coding machine learning github
[WEB] electronic health record information extraction github

tools.name: ANTs
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced Normalization Tools for medical image registration and segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A state-of-the-art medical image processing toolkit providing advanced methods for image registration, segmentation, and statistical analysis, widely used in neuroimaging.

tools.name: pymetamap
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for the NLM MetaMap medical NLP tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper that facilitates the use of the National Library of Medicine's MetaMap tool, allowing for the extraction of Unified Medical Language System (UMLS) concepts from biomedical text within Python workflows.

tools.name: Clinical-ICD10-Code-Prediction
tools.one_line_profile: BERT-based API for predicting ICD-10 codes from clinical descriptions
tools.detailed_description: A tool providing an API to predict ICD-10 codes from clinical text descriptions using a Transformer-based model (BERT) fine-tuned on clinical data.

tools.name: NLP2FHIR
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for normalizing clinical NLP results to FHIR standard
tools.detailed_description: A clinical data normalization pipeline that converts unstructured clinical text into structured HL7 FHIR resources, facilitating interoperability and secondary use of EHR data.

tools.name: bluima
tools.one_line_profile: Natural Language Processing toolkit tailored for neuroscience
tools.detailed_description: An NLP toolkit developed by the Blue Brain Project, specifically designed for extracting information from neuroscience literature, including entity recognition for brain regions and proteins.

tools.name: NERO-nlp
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical Named Entity Recognition and Ontology package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for biomedical Named Entity Recognition (NER) and ontology mapping, designed to facilitate the extraction of biomedical entities from text.

tools.name: astred
tools.one_line_profile: Library for linguistic sentence comparison and word alignment
tools.detailed_description: A library for linguistically comparing sentences, useful for analyzing translation quality, measuring syntactic distance, and word alignment in computational linguistics.

tools.name: spacy_conll
tools.one_line_profile: SpaCy pipeline component for CoNLL-U formatting
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline component for spaCy that adds CoNLL-U properties to documents, enabling interoperability with tools requiring CoNLL format for linguistic annotations.

tools.name: Opioid_SUD_MHI_MedCodes
tools.one_line_profile: ICD-10-CM code definitions for opioid and substance use disorders
tools.detailed_description: A library of code definitions and logic to flag ICD-10-CM codes related to opioid involvement, substance use disorder, and mental health issues in structured hospital data, developed by the CDC.

tools.name: MedCAT
tools.one_line_profile: Medical Concept Annotation Tool for EHR data
tools.detailed_description: A highly efficient tool for extracting, linking, and normalizing medical concepts from Electronic Health Records (EHR) to knowledge bases like SNOMED-CT or UMLS, supporting unsupervised training.

tools.name: MedCATtrainer
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for inspecting and improving MedCAT models
tools.detailed_description: A web-based interface designed to inspect, improve, and add concepts to biomedical Named Entity Recognition and Linking models, specifically tailored for the MedCAT ecosystem.

tools.name: MetaMaps
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for long-read metagenomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: A tool for mapping long-read sequencing data (e.g., Nanopore) to reference databases for metagenomic analysis, enabling strain-level identification.

tools.name: clinicalBERT
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained BERT embeddings for clinical text
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing publicly available BERT embeddings trained on clinical notes (MIMIC-III), serving as a foundational resource/model for clinical NLP tasks.

tools.name: QuickUMLS
tools.one_line_profile: Fast medical concept extraction and linking system
tools.detailed_description: A fast, approximate dictionary matching system for medical concept extraction and linking to the UMLS, designed for efficiency in processing large clinical text corpora.

tools.name: BioBERTpt
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical and Clinical BERT models for the Portuguese language
tools.detailed_description: A pre-trained language model based on BERT, specifically adapted for biomedical and clinical text in Portuguese, enabling named entity recognition and relation extraction tasks in this language domain.

tools.name: SNOMEDCT-ICD11-mapping
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for generating SNOMED CT to ICD-11 mappings
tools.detailed_description: Official coding approaches and utilities from IHTSDO for generating and managing maps between SNOMED CT concepts and ICD-11 classification codes.

tools.name: AGATHA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning system for hypothesis generation from biomedical graphs
tools.detailed_description: Automatic Graph-mining And Transformer based Hypothesis generation Approach (AGATHA) is a tool that predicts potential connections in biomedical knowledge graphs to generate scientific hypotheses.

tools.name: Spark NLP
tools.one_line_profile: State-of-the-art Natural Language Processing library for Spark
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive NLP library built on Apache Spark, widely used in healthcare for tasks such as clinical entity recognition, assertion status detection, and de-identification.

tools.name: Spark NLP Display
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization library for Spark NLP annotations
tools.detailed_description: A specialized visualization tool designed to display annotations generated by Spark NLP pipelines, such as dependency trees, NER entities, and assertion status in Jupyter notebooks.

tools.name: CTakesParser.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia parser for cTAKES clinical text analysis output
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package designed to parse and process the XMI/XML output generated by the Apache cTAKES clinical text analysis system, facilitating downstream data analysis.

tools.name: ICD_GEMs.jl
tools.one_line_profile: ICD-9 to ICD-10 mapping tool using GEMs
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package that enables translation between ICD-9 and ICD-10 medical codes using the General Equivalence Mappings (GEMs) standards.

tools.name: deplacy
tools.one_line_profile: CUI-based visualizer for NLP dependency trees
tools.detailed_description: A tool for visualizing Universal Dependencies trees and Catena analysis in the terminal or notebooks, useful for inspecting linguistic structures in NLP tasks.

tools.name: MetaMap
tools.one_line_profile: Source code for NLM MetaMap Named Entity Recognizer
tools.detailed_description: The source code (Prolog/C) for the National Library of Medicine's MetaMap system, which maps biomedical text to concepts in the UMLS Metathesaurus.

tools.name: fda-ars
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for processing FDA Structured Product Labels
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools from the NLM for processing text within FDA Structured Product Labels (SPL) and handling adverse reaction data.

tools.name: MetaMapLite
tools.one_line_profile: Near real-time biomedical named-entity recognizer
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight, high-speed version of MetaMap developed by NLM for real-time named entity recognition and UMLS concept mapping in biomedical text.

tools.name: PLM-ICD
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic ICD coding tool using pretrained language models
tools.detailed_description: A framework for automatic ICD coding from clinical text using pretrained language models (PLMs) with label-aware attention mechanisms.

tools.name: ICD-9 to ICD-10 Conversion Function
tools.one_line_profile: R function for converting ICD-9 codes to ICD-10
tools.detailed_description: A development repository for functions incorporated into the R 'icd' package to convert International Classification of Diseases codes from Ninth to Tenth revisions.

tools.name: medaCy
tools.one_line_profile: Medical text mining and information extraction framework
tools.detailed_description: A medical text mining and information extraction library built on top of spaCy, designed for clinical NLP tasks.

tools.name: UMLS-KG
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge graph builder from UMLS sources
tools.detailed_description: A tool to build a knowledge graph from UMLS Knowledge Sources, enabling loading, visualization, and querying with Neo4j and Scispacy.

tools.name: biobert_embedding
tools.one_line_profile: BioBERT embedding generator
tools.detailed_description: A library to generate token and sentence level embeddings from the BioBERT model for biomedical text analysis.

tools.name: node-MetaMap
tools.one_line_profile: Node.js wrapper for MetaMap API
tools.detailed_description: A package providing access to the MetaMap Web API for UMLS concept mapping from Node.js applications.

tools.name: relna
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical relation extraction tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for biomedical relation extraction focusing on Transcription Factors and Gene/Gene Products.

tools.name: medical-ner
tools.one_line_profile: Clinical Named Entity Recognition with UMLS
tools.detailed_description: A clinical Named Entity Recognition (NER) tool integrated with UMLS lookup for entity normalization.

tools.name: CORD-19-ANN
tools.one_line_profile: Semantic search for CORD-19 dataset
tools.detailed_description: An Approximate Nearest Neighbor (ANN) search tool for the COVID-19 Open Research Dataset (CORD-19) using SBERT embeddings.

tools.name: simple_icd_10
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for ICD-10 codes
tools.detailed_description: A simple Python library for validating, formatting, and querying ICD-10 codes.

tools.name: simple_icd_10_CM
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for ICD-10-CM codes
tools.detailed_description: A simple Python library for validating, formatting, and querying ICD-10-CM (Clinical Modification) codes.

tools.name: MetaMap-REST-API
tools.one_line_profile: REST API wrapper for MetaMap
tools.detailed_description: A REST API implementation for interacting with the MetaMap tool for biomedical text processing.

tools.name: ukb-ICD10-event-extraction
tools.one_line_profile: ICD-10 extraction tools for UK Biobank
tools.detailed_description: R functions for extracting diagnoses and first diagnosis dates from UK Biobank data fields based on ICD-10 codes.

tools.name: de.uke.iam.automapping
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic mapping to SNOMED-CT
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automatically mapping clinical terms into SNOMED-CT concepts.

tools.name: UMLS-EDA
tools.one_line_profile: UMLS-based data augmentation for NLP
tools.detailed_description: A light-weighted UMLS-based data augmentation tool for biomedical NLP tasks including Named Entity Recognition and sentence classification.

tools.name: icd10
tools.one_line_profile: Fast ICD-10 diagnosis code search library
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library for fast searching and lookup of ICD-10 diagnosis codes.

tools.name: icdpicr
tools.one_line_profile: Injury code classification in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package for injury code classification and scoring based on ICD codes.

tools.name: acq4
tools.one_line_profile: Data acquisition platform for neurophysiology
tools.detailed_description: A platform for data acquisition and device control in patch clamp electrophysiology, optogenetics, and imaging experiments.

tools.name: metamap-snakemake
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic mapping workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow to map and quantify microbial genomes in metagenomic reads (Note: distinct from NLM MetaMap).

tools.name: MetaMapR
tools.one_line_profile: Network mapping and data integration tool for metabolomics and biochemical data
tools.detailed_description: MetaMapR is a tool designed to integrate biochemical, structural, and spectral data for metabolomics analysis. It facilitates network mapping and visualization of metabolic pathways and connections.

tools.name: BERN
tools.one_line_profile: Neural named entity recognition and multi-type normalization tool for biomedical text
tools.detailed_description: BERN (Biomedical Entity Recognition and Normalization) is a tool for biomedical text mining that performs named entity recognition and normalization for various entity types including genes, diseases, and drugs.

tools.name: BioASQ-BioBERT
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained BioBERT model fine-tuned for biomedical question answering
tools.detailed_description: A biomedical question answering model based on BioBERT, pre-trained and fine-tuned on the BioASQ dataset to answer biomedical questions.

tools.name: BioBERT
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained biomedical language representation model for biomedical text mining
tools.detailed_description: BioBERT is a pre-trained language representation model for biomedical text mining. It is initialized with BERT and pre-trained on large-scale biomedical corpora (PubMed and PMC) to improve performance on biomedical NLP tasks.

tools.name: BioBERT-PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of the BioBERT biomedical language model
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of BioBERT, facilitating the use of the pre-trained biomedical language model in PyTorch-based workflows for biomedical text mining.

tools.name: Bio-LM
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework and pre-trained models for biomedical and clinical NLP tasks
tools.detailed_description: A repository from Facebook Research that evaluates various models for biomedical and clinical NLP tasks and provides new pre-trained models optimized for these domains.

tools.name: HUNER
tools.one_line_profile: Named Entity Recognition tool specifically designed for biomedical entities
tools.detailed_description: HUNER is a Named Entity Recognition (NER) tool tailored for the biomedical domain, capable of identifying various biomedical entities in text.

tools.name: icd-codex
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for graphical and continuous representations of ICD9 and ICD10 codes
tools.detailed_description: icd-codex is a Python library that provides tools for working with ICD-9 and ICD-10 medical codes, including generating graphical representations and continuous embeddings for healthcare data analysis.

tools.name: Kindred
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for biomedical relation extraction using supervised learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for biomedical relation extraction that uses a supervised approach. It simplifies the process of extracting relations from biomedical texts by providing a user-friendly interface for training and prediction.

tools.name: ICD-10-CSV
tools.one_line_profile: Structured dataset of ICD-10 medical classification codes
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing a comma-separated file of 2018 ICD-10 codes, facilitating the integration of standard medical coding into digital health applications and analysis pipelines.

tools.name: MedKnow
tools.one_line_profile: Medical relations and entities extraction tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool designed for extracting medical entities and relations from clinical text, supporting tasks such as named entity recognition and relation classification in the biomedical domain.

tools.name: clinspacy
tools.one_line_profile: Clinical Natural Language Processing pipeline for R
tools.detailed_description: An R package that performs clinical natural language processing using spaCy, scispacy, and medspacy. It enables R users to perform biomedical named entity recognition, UMLS mapping, and negation detection.

tools.name: ClinicalBERT
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained BERT models for clinical notes and hospital readmission prediction
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing code and pre-trained models for ClinicalBERT, designed to model clinical notes and predict hospital readmission. It adapts the BERT architecture to the clinical domain.

tools.name: Clinical-NER
tools.one_line_profile: Named Entity Recognition for Chinese Electronic Medical Records
tools.detailed_description: A tool specifically designed for Named Entity Recognition (NER) in Chinese clinical texts and electronic medical records (EMR), utilizing deep learning techniques.

tools.name: Bio-Relex
tools.one_line_profile: Joint Biomedical Entity and Relation Extraction framework
tools.detailed_description: A system for joint biomedical entity and relation extraction that employs knowledge-enhanced collective inference to improve performance on biomedical literature.

tools.name: BiOnt
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning for Relation Extraction using Biomedical Ontologies
tools.detailed_description: BiOnt leverages multiple biomedical ontologies within a deep learning framework to enhance relation extraction from biomedical texts.

tools.name: bio-ner
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical Named Entity Recognition and Normalization library
tools.detailed_description: A library for Biomedical Named Entity Recognition and Normalization, focusing on diseases, chemicals, and genetic entities using state-of-the-art models.

tools.name: icd
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for working with ICD codes and comorbidities analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to handle International Classification of Diseases (ICD) codes, enabling validation, formatting, and analysis of comorbidities in medical datasets.

tools.name: medspaCy
tools.one_line_profile: Clinical NLP library using spaCy for information extraction from medical text
tools.detailed_description: A library for clinical natural language processing implemented with spaCy, offering tools for concept extraction, negation detection (ConText), and section detection in clinical notes.

tools.name: CLAMP-DrugDiscovery
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive Language-Assisted Molecule Pre-training for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A framework enhancing activity prediction models in drug discovery by integrating the ability to understand human language, facilitating the alignment of chemical and linguistic representations.

tools.name: BioBERT
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained biomedical language representation model for biomedical text mining
tools.detailed_description: A domain-specific language representation model pre-trained on large-scale biomedical corpora, designed to improve performance on biomedical text mining tasks such as NER, relation extraction, and QA.

tools.name: BioMedICUS
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical and clinical NLP engine for information extraction
tools.detailed_description: A biomedical and clinical natural language processing engine developed by the University of Minnesota, providing a pipeline for processing clinical text and extracting biomedical entities.

tools.name: blabla
tools.one_line_profile: Linguistic feature extraction library for clinical analysis
tools.detailed_description: A library for extracting linguistic features from text, often used in clinical settings for analyzing speech patterns related to neurological or psychiatric conditions.

tools.name: BRAN
tools.one_line_profile: Bi-affine Relation Attention Networks for biomedical relation extraction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Bi-affine Relation Attention Networks (BRAN) for extracting relations between entities in biological texts, supporting full abstract processing.

tools.name: GENIA Tagger
tools.one_line_profile: C++ implementation of the GENIA tagger for biomedical text analysis
tools.detailed_description: A tool for part-of-speech tagging, shallow parsing, and named entity recognition specifically tuned for biomedical text, derived from the GENIA corpus.

tools.name: icd9
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for managing and validating ICD-9 codes
tools.detailed_description: A library for working with ICD-9 codes, providing functionality to traverse the code hierarchy, validate codes, and manage medical classification data.

tools.name: ICD-Mappings
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for mapping ICD codes to clinical risk adjustment models
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that enables mapping of ICD-9 and ICD-10 codes to various medical concepts and risk scores such as CCS, CCI, and Elixhauser comorbidities.

tools.name: Stanza
tools.one_line_profile: Python NLP library with state-of-the-art biomedical models
tools.detailed_description: A Python natural language analysis package that includes a biomedical module with models trained on biomedical literature and clinical text for tasks like tokenization, NER, and parsing.

tools.name: MedType
tools.one_line_profile: Medical entity linking tool with semantic type prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for improving medical entity linking by incorporating semantic type prediction, useful for normalizing medical entities in clinical text.

tools.name: SWHLab
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tools for whole-cell patch-clamp electrophysiological data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for the analysis of ABF files and other data formats from whole-cell patch-clamp electrophysiology experiments.

tools.name: Annotated Twitter COVID-19 Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedically oriented annotated Twitter COVID-19 dataset
tools.detailed_description: A dataset of tweets related to COVID-19, automatically annotated for biomedical entities and events, useful for public health surveillance and NLP research.

tools.name: PyCTakesParser
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities to parse Apache cTAKES output
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility library for parsing and processing the XMI output generated by the Apache cTAKES clinical NLP system.

tools.name: ctakes-ade
tools.one_line_profile: cTAKES module for extracting drug adverse events
tools.detailed_description: A module for the Apache cTAKES clinical NLP system specifically designed to extract mentions of adverse drug events from clinical text.

tools.name: ClinicalTransformerNER
tools.one_line_profile: Library for clinical named entity recognition
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for training and deploying Transformer-based models for Named Entity Recognition (NER) in clinical text.

tools.name: dutch-medical-concepts
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to create Dutch medical concept tables for NER
tools.detailed_description: Code and instructions to generate tables of UMLS, SNOMED, or HPO concepts with Dutch names, enabling NER and entity linking in Dutch clinical text.

tools.name: spark-nkp
tools.one_line_profile: Natural Korean Processor for Apache Spark
tools.detailed_description: A library for processing Korean natural language text within the Apache Spark framework, suitable for large-scale NLP tasks.

tools.name: ClaMP
tools.one_line_profile: Malware classifier dataset from PE headers
tools.detailed_description: A dataset for malware classification built from header fields of Portable Executable (PE) files, used for cybersecurity research.

tools.name: codelists
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for medical code lists (SNOMED, ICD-10, ATC)
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate code lists for clinical research using combinations of SNOMED ECL, ICD-10, and ATC codes.

tools.name: EHRAgent
tools.one_line_profile: LLM agent framework for tabular reasoning on EHR
tools.detailed_description: A framework enabling Large Language Models to perform complex tabular reasoning on Electronic Health Records (EHR) through code generation.

tools.name: icdcoder
tools.one_line_profile: R package for ICD-9 and ICD-10 code utilities
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing utility functions and datasets for working with ICD-9 and ICD-10 medical billing codes.

tools.name: TidyStanza.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Tidyverse-like data manipulation for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library attempting to implement Tidyverse-style APIs for data manipulation, facilitating scientific data analysis in Julia.
